posts.title: 测试二
posts.text: 第二篇测试1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465666768697071// 贪心错解#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;const int N = 2005;int val[N], a[N], b[N];int ma[N << 2], id[N << 2];#define ls (root << 1)#define rs (root << 1 | 1)#define mid ((l + r) >> 1)void update(int l, int r, int root, int i, int k, int val){ if (k > ma[root]) {ma[root] = k, id[root] = i;} if (l == r) return; if (val <= mid) update(l, mid, ls, i, k, val); else update(mid + 1, r, rs, i, k, val);}int qurey(int l, int r, int root, int val){ if (val < l) return 0; if (r <= val) return root; int a = qurey(l, mid, ls, val); int b = qurey(mid + 1, r, rs, val); return (ma[a] > ma[b] ? a : b);}int pre[N];int solve(int n, int siz){ memset(ma, 0, sizeof ma); memset(id, 0, sizeof id); memset(pre, 0, sizeof pre); int rt, ff, maxnum = 0, maxid = 0; for (int i = 1; i <= n; i ++) { if (b[i] == 0) continue; rt = qurey(1, siz, 1, b[i]); pre[i] = id[rt]; ff = ma[rt] + a[b[i]]; // cout << i << " " << ff << endl; if (ff > maxnum) maxnum = ff, maxid = i; update(1, siz, 1, i, ff, b[i]); } while (maxid) b[maxid] = 0, maxid = pre[maxid]; return maxnum;}int main(){ ios::sync_with_stdio(false); cin.tie(NULL); int t, n, k, siz; cin >> t; while (t--) { cin >> n >> k; for (int i = 1; i <= n; i ++) cin >> val[i], a[i] = val[i]; sort(a + 1, a + n + 1); siz = unique(a + 1, a + n + 1) - a; for (int i = 1; i <= n; i ++) b[i] = lower_bound(a + 1, a + siz + 1, val[i]) - a; int ans = 0; while (k--) ans += solve(n, siz); cout << ans << endl; }}
